fields.description: When using the dark keyboard (KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_ALERT), and in general a dark UI, there's a very noticeable white flash when they keyboard is being dismissed (animated down). It looks as if the keyboard switches to the white style immediately when starting the animation. However it might also be a different glitch. Screenshot taken during dismissal attached.
fields.summary: iOS 7: Keyboard flashes to white while being dismissed

comments.body: Thanks for reporting this issue. We need a simple test case and environment information (for example, Titanium SDK version) to troubleshoot this issue. I would appreciate if you can provide the same.

Resolving this ticket as we have not been able to reproduce the issue and we have not received the requested information. We would be happy to reopen the ticket and investigate it further if you can provide the requested test case.
